name: Hexa Block Ultimate! with Spin
description:
Over 30000 levels of Hexa block puzzles! Spin and Rotate blocks! Featuring Toughest puzzles for the most brilliant mind! Best game of its kind! Challenging, Addictive, Hours of Fun!

How To Play:
- Fill puzzles completely with all puzzle pieces to win.
- Puzzle pieces can be rotated in spinning levels.
- Use hint to help with difficult levels

Why this game:
- over 30,000 original puzzles! All completely free!
- One-of-a-kind puzzles with spinning blocks!
- Puzzles from simple to extremely hard!
- Solution with each puzzle!
- Suitable for kids and adults alike!
- Amazing graphic and animations!
- Fully Optimized for latest iPhones and iPads!
